question: Your internet connection has been slow and intermittent Write a letter to your internet service provider to complain about. In the letter: – Describe the problem and why you are unhappy – Arrange for an engineer to visit your home – Request a reduction in your bill
text: I am writing this letter requesting your assistance with my complaint. Essentially, one fundamental concern is probably that I receive  poor internet service these days. As your loyal ,customer this serious problem made me unhappy.

Firstly let me explain in detail. I am receiving your service for 5 years and never had a problem since last week after speeding up the Internet while your customer representative offered a more speedy connection,However after this ,changing it started some failures.

On the other hand, I want to let you inform you about this poor connection issue is affected my daily business routines owing to having a home office job. Moreover, we could not watch internet tv properly as well. In ,addition my kids are unhappy too because it disturbs their online gaming life.

In my view, there are a few ways to tackle this problem when dealing refund the bill, the easiest way to solve it would be to cancel the service without any commission fee. Actually, you may send an engineer first to determine the main cause
I am looking to hearing from you as soon as possible
